S.FORM: Brunei hya' ga cyux maki' tay 4 30 N, 114 40 E na Aziya' syuw. Brunei hya' ga cyux maki' tay 4 30 N, 114 40 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 5,765 sq km (maki' tay 173ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 5,265 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 500 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 436,620. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 2.5 , lhlahuy hya' ga 71.80 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 25.70 . (Brunei) spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Bandar Seri Begawan. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 23 na tay sazing byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Haji Hassanal Bolkiah Mu'izzaddin Waddaulah, aring ryax 5 squ byacing tay 10 sa kawas 1967 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. zyuwaw kin raral aring squ 8 Seci lga nyux ki'an na squliq la ,maki Cyukok na bnrwan naha zyuwaw kin raral ga sun naha, bnrwan nqu zyuwaw kin raral hya ga Brunei sun naha, maki uzi qu bnrwan naha maha . maki squ ziray na ,maki qutux hi' lalu nya ga Pinka naha ki ngasan nya kaundinya ,naha ga smnhi squ Paypya. skahun squ bnrwan naha hya qu smsun lmahang squ 136nqu rhyan , kbalay squ king ka ttman mrhuw, taqu qqplan nya ga kinnalay nya squ Ing kinbalay nya smyax na btunux qu qbbu nq Mrhuw, pongan kay ga taqu kilwagiq nqu qbbu nya ga 1kung ci kilwagi nya. maki518 kawas pnosa nya qutux Psatu musa squ Cyukok ru biqan nya qutux ssamaw squ rhyan qu Mhuw.maki squ523 kawas ,pnosa nya qutux qu Psatu musa binah na Kokka. maki squ ziray na Mrhuw na Brunei Hu Lu Na Po ru ngasannya Chiari Ya Ka maki sa 616 kawas, pinnosa naha uzi qu Psatu musa Cyukok. maki squ ziray na , k'nita na kwara squliq ga cinmuywaw balay qu Mrhuw na Brunei ma,maki squ kawas na (669),minpposa cingay na Psatu musa te Cyukok. zik nqu Kawas na binnrwan naha qutux squ lalu na mrhuw Hiang Ta, min maki kbhul qu qasu nya, ru maki uzi qu hitay nya . maki squ zki na kawas , mrhuw Hiang Ta ga s'tun nya qu Psatu musa Cyukok, lalu na linhoyan Psatu qasa ga Sheikh Noh ki Kadhi Kasim. maki squ kawas mkura tltu 1082 kawas 2 byacing, minstun nya uzi qu Psatu musa Cyukok. Pinnongan kmal maha,lalu nqu Psatu qani ga Seri Maharaja 'mmyunaw hya ga Raha Makatuna ki Sang Aji taqu Sang Aji ga m'yutas nqu la. maki sa1395 kawas biru bnrwan na kmal maha maki squ15 Kokka ini ptciriq ga , qani uzi ma. bsyq balay sqbangan na gaga Cyukok qu Brunei qani ,babaw nqu 13 Seci m'gaga na .ziray nqu Brunei ga kahul ki tmmnwang na qu gmleng maras squ rngu sinqunan na squliq na Cyukok. kawas na mruwh minmma gmleng maras tthoki musa Cyukok mita squ .wal rasun na 'nbula,'blun squ buqun nqu mrhuw na misuw qani . maki squ binnrwan zyuwaw kinraral ga gluw na Brunei mrhuw hya ga qani qu puqing na mrhuw naha , mucing soni naga maki na qu buqun nqu kwara hhitay . 14 Seci, Brunei thriq squ qinhtan na ,maki squ zik te14 tehok squ 15 Seci mintxan krahu balay qu rngu naha, kwara ana mkura kilux ru ki ga rhyan nqu Kokka naha tqbangun na squliq ru kwra qpzing naha lga wal mn gyut mskongat la. rhyan nyux maki squ wiway s'luwi ru mkilux qutux kawas nqu ,kwara rhyan qani ga psgayun ni maha ht'gan wagi,ru tekyopan wagi sazing qu qinsugan nya. mmusa su squsazing qinsugan hrhyan qani ga siki pwah su squ rhyan na , mucing squ 2020 kawas baqun mwah na glgan qu hongu na lga,pbuyaun naha qu sazing rahyan qani la. pklahang ptzyuwaw squ squli gaga nqu pklahang ptzyuwaw squ squli Brunei nqu 'mubuy aring squ14 Seci qani ga smmyunaw squ mrhuw naha ,squ m'Sexu nqu Kokka ru mrhuw na thokiy hhitay. qani ga skahul nya squ lalu na mrhuw Kokka m'thoki na Brunei .kwara nqu ps'rux gaga' linhoyan Gi'ing na Brunei ga qani qu musa mtywaw,ungat qu ginoywaw nqu ssquliq na ps'rux gaga' linhoyan Sexu hya . mwaha smsun zyuwaw na Kokka naha hya ga yaqu kwra qu zik na pinkyalan ga maki kya uzi qu kay na , Bungka ru gaga qu spyang naha sinnhyan nqu qu glgan naha, rmuruw squ ps'rux gaga' linhoyan ki nirang kinnita naha,qpzing nqu mrhuw te babaw, shtuy naha msgagay gaga na pinsrhgan naha . Brunei skahul squ pinsrux gaga Brunei. Brunei hya ga mrhuw na Kokka naha,mrhuw nqu sinnhyan ,mtnaq maki sinnpung nqu yuwaw, ps'rux gaga', maki qu qpzing krahu. Misuw qani hya ga te 29 Seci ,1946kawas hintagan nya squ Brunei syuw.bes mrhuw qasa ga wiwal nqu sswae knril .1967 kawas sazing hi qani lga msqun la, spayat qu laqi nya kneril sazing qu laqi nya mlikuy qu qani, pyang krahu laqi mikuy ga mosa galan squ mrhuw babaw.1981kawas magan lozi bes melaqi sazing laqi mlikuy ru sazing laqi kneril .2003 kawas sazing byacing , mtalax ki kbnahun nya magal kwara qu lamu na lalu . 2005kawas 8 byacing 20 ryax maki squ spzyang qalang na ki msqun .qutux qu laqi mlikuy ru qutux qu laqi kneril naha. mali 2010 kawas 6 byacing,msgagay qu rusa qani. ubuy mrhuw ngasan ubuy mrhuw ngasan Brunei ga kilrrngu rmuruw gaga maha mway mslpiyung nqu ubuy mrhuw gluw ta nanak ,teta kinrrhuw qu qpzing cintman na squliq ru mlahang squ qpzing cintman nqu ubuy mrhuw cinngasa maha kya qu gaga nya, wiwal nqu pleliq lmahang qutux ramu na ubuy mrhuw ngasan. misuw kneril nya qaniy ga(Saleha binti Mohamed Alam)wiwal sswe nya nanak, yaya nya (Damit binti Abdul Rahman)ki yaba na (Pengiran Pemancha Pengiran Anak Haji Mohammad Alam)mtswae naha nanak:yutas naha (Omar Ali Saifuddien III)hya ga laqi nqu (Hashim Jalilul Alam Aqamaddin)wiwal nqu laqi naha nanak.nanau yasa qu ki m't yata qu m't ina naank . kinlhangan na kki'an Kokka nqu Brunei ga spayat qu qinsugan nya kinlhangan na kki'an (daerah): maki squ Kokka na Brunei ga Kil qu pyang cikiy , mrhuw Kokka nqu qalang (Bandar Seri Begawan; sun naha maha smral na qalang Brunei)maki squ zik na Kil , kilhgcyan nya ga 571pinbang kugri , kinhmayan na squli nya ga 230,030 . Kil ga spyang krahu naqalang kinghyan nya ga 2,724 pinbang kuri kinhmayan na squliq nya ga 55,602. Kil ki rhyan ga qwyan na Brunei mkkita squ talay nanak Kil kinghyan nya ga 1,304 pinbang kugri kinhmayan na squli nya ga 8,563. Kil kinghyan nya ga 1,166 pinbang kugri kinhmayan na squli nya ga 38,649. gwahan na pila puqing na abura ki m'ma na Gasuring qani qu spyang psr'an naha , kwara qu pinhtagan naha mtyuwaw kbalay ggwahan na qeqaya Kokka ga kya wal squ 90 maki squ ht'gan wagi ki mkura kilux ,snli naha squ abura ru kil cingay nya ga hnasun nya qu te sazing .Kokka naqu Brunei qani ga spyang cinmuyuwaw na qutux Kokka, hya qani ki ga ta sazing na kin cinmuywaw maki squ Kokka nqu ht'gan wagi ki mkura kilux ,ana ga misuw knita naha squ Kokka na Brunei qani ga nyux minaring kbalay na. 2005 kawas squliq nqu Brunei kinblayan naha qu kwara qeqaya ga mosa siki 15,964 pila nqu Amirika,squliq na Kokka naha kya ga ini biq Giking . 2010 kawas squliq na Kokka Brunei kinblayan naha qu kwara qeqaya ga mosa siki 51,600 pila nqu Amirika. Kinbalay squ Koba Brunei(Brunei Investment Company)qani ga maki te 9 'byan ru nniqan cyux maki sa , , ru ana yaqu 'byan ru nniqan, (The Dorchester)'byan ru nniqan,ru (Plaza Athenee)ki 'an 'byan ru nniqan. sinnhyan sinnhyan nqu Kokka Brunei ga Kyokay qaniy hya ga mrhuw pgleng nqu Kyokay.smmnhi squ Kyokay hya ga kinhmayan na squli nya ga wayal squ70 kinhmayan na squli smnhi squ paysimin hya ga wayal squ 12 kinhmayan na squli smmnhi squ Kirisstokyo hya ga 9 .
